ICC INTRISICS
=============

# 1 W Point Source Heating in Infinite Isotropic Scattering Medium

# Photons    =   100000

# extra	     0.01603
=============
# (https://omlc.ogi.edu)
# 1 W Point Source Heating in Infinite Isotropic Scattering Medium
# CPU version, adapted for PEAGPGPU by Gustavo Castellano and Nicolas Wolovick
# Scattering =   20.000/cm
# Absorption =    2.000/cm
# Photons    = 20000000
#
# 53.836260 seconds
# 371.496830 K photons per second
# Radius	Heat
# [microns]	[W/cm^3]	Error
     0	 20760.92139	    62.79724

   950	    32.17716	     0.07304

  1700	     7.59590	     0.02008
